mention.text: rector of the central american university
jose maria tojeira stated at a news conference
segundo montes , juan ramon moreno , armando lopez , and joaquin lopez
domestic elba ramos and her 15-year-old daughter
the priests , five of them spaniards
tojeira , who was quite upset during the news conference
the same ones who assassinated msgr romero
